author: Tom Nicholas
description:
Please consider helping to support my work at https://patreon.com/tomnicholas

Has Elon Musk's X (previously Twitter) dragged our political conversation to the right? Or is it creating a delusion dreamworld for conservatives which is has the potential to backfire?

Written, directed, and presented by Tom Nicholas.
Filmed and edited by Georgia Burrows.
Additional research, writing and production assistance by Jack Carter.

*Chapters*

00:00 Twitter isn't real life.
00:58 Elon Musk's Twitter Takeover
03:14 Lucy Connolly: Hero or Villain?
06:12 The Brink of Civil War?
07:54 Nigel Farage's Fragile Coalition
11:24 Flagging and Deflagging
13:24 Let's Not Get Complacent
